metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4008 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before 1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SProcRenderCompositeGlyphs function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs xwayland package contains parts of xorg-server This is ZDI-CAN-14192

criterions.comment: xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
